item.title: EP 349 - The Cult Of Bismarck, ND
item.itunes:title: The Cult Of Bismarck, ND
item.description:
Today we help translate ancient spells, and then we investigate multiple missing people and a Satanic cult in North Dakota!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

  A Chicago Library Needs Help Transcribing 17th-Century Spellbooks

https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/502753/chicago-library-needs-help-transcribing-17th-century-spellbooks

 

Transcribe/Translate

http://publications.newberry.org/dig/rc-transcribe/transcribe?path=index

 

Can you read this spellbook for 17th-century witches? This library has a job for you

https://qz.com/1028177/can-you-read-these-spellbooks-for-medieval-witches-this-library-has-a-job-for-you/

 

Book of magical charms

http://publications.newberry.org/dig/rc-transcribe/charms

 

John Henry Jacobson

http://charleyproject.org/case/john-henry-jacobson

Sandra Mary Jacobson

http://charleyproject.org/case/sandra-mary-jacobson

 

Jacobson,Sandra M.missing Nov 16,1996

https://www.tapatalk.com/groups/usedtobedoe/jacobson-sandra-m-missing-nov-16-1996-t5353.html

 

1511DMND - John Henry Jacobson

http://www.doenetwork.org/cases/1511dmnd.html

 

Missing persons cases are not forgotten

https://bismarcktribune.com/news/local/missing-persons-cases-are-not-forgotten/article_241b6405-0ee3-51fd-8462-875d5f0fcf8b.html

 

Missing person cases in Bismarck still open after 25, 30 years

https://bismarcktribune.com/news/local/bismarck/missing-person-cases-in-bismarck-still-open-after-years/article_f3c37943-8b91-57a8-99b4-6f30b21832d0.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
